text: Charles "Butch" Shaw (born January 8, 1948) is an American politician in the state of Vermont. He is a member of the Vermont House of Representatives, sitting as a Republican from the Rutland-6 district, having been first elected in 2010.https://legislature.vermont.gov/people/single/2018.1/15553 ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Members of the Vermont House of Representatives Category:Vermont Republicans
title: Butch Shaw
